title: Bug 18934 - Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they have no effect. Even when opening a small image like an icon, the scrollbars are misleading because they do not function.
EB: The expected behavior is that the scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled, regardless of the size of the image being displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example. 
2. Observe the enabled scrollbars. 
3. Attempt to use the scrollbars and notice that they have no effect.
